settings.heading: Which type of Dog Fence is right for me?
settings.quiz_table:
Best Use Environment Whether you need it indoors or outdoors, the wireless fence performs effectively for homes with small or medium-sized yards, as well as in rural areas and wooded locations Outdoors in open areas with a clear sky view for optimal GPS signal reception. For reliable performance, avoid indoor places, dense forests or heavily built-up urban areas
Area Small to Medium Medium to Large
Range 11-330 yards 11-1000 yards
Rechargeable ✓ ✓
Min strap length 9.5in 9in
Signal source 2.4GHz GPS
Main obstacles Thick Walls - reduce effective range for 20-25% Roofs, Trees - anything between the satellite and the collar
settings.text2: Answer 5 simple questions and we pick the system that fits the best for your needs.
settings.quiz_description: Find the perfect GPS or Wireless Dog Fence system for your furry friend. Take our quick 3-minute quiz to identify the ideal solution to your dog's needs and the unique characteristics of your location.
